entry.title: 无套利
entry.content:
定义

  • 套利(arbitrage) 定义: 买入一定的资产并随机卖出(或者相反),利用差价获利的行为
  • 无套利(no-arbitrage)假设,是金融产品和衍生品定价理论的基本假设——由于市场的流动性和信息透明性,市场熵不存在套利机会,世界上么有免费的午餐!
  • 单利(simple interest): An amount \(A\) invested for \(n\) periods at a simple interest rate of \(r\) per period is worth \(A(1+n \cdot r)\) at maturity. ^697b0a
  • 复利(compound interest): An amount \(A\) invested for \(n\) periods at a compound interest rate of \(r\) per period is worth \(A(1+r)^{n}\) at maturity. ^38a586
  • 连续复利(Continuous compounding):Continuous compounding corresponds to the situation where the length of the compounding period goes to zero. Therefore, an amount \(A\) invested for \(y\) years is worth \(\lim _{n \rightarrow \infty} A(1+r / n)^{y n}=A e^{r y}\) at maturity. ^52ad8d
    • 将时间序列的间隔不断逼近0

无套利定价策略

利用无套利定价理论为金融产品定价时，常常构造两个相反的投资组合（portfolio），模拟同一个交易的双方，金融产品的定价使得双方均不可能在交易中套利

对于一份合约,我们定义 - Pay price \(p\) at time \(t=0\) - Receive \(c_{k}\) at time \(t=k, k=1, \ldots, T\)

clash flow \(c_k\) 非负 对于这份合约,存在两种无套利的情况

  • Weak No-Arbitrage: \(c_{k} \geq 0\) for all \(k \geq 1 \Rightarrow p \geq 0\)
    • 弱无套利表示合约未来的收入可以为0
  • Strong No-Arbitrage: \(c_{k} \geq 0\) for all \(k \geq 1\) and \(c_{\ell}>0\) for some \(\ell \Rightarrow p>0\)
    • 强无套利表示未来合约的收入不能为0(天下没有免费的午餐)

根据无套利原则,我们进行定价 - Construct the following portfolio(投资组合)(对于买方) - Buy the contract at price \(p\) - Borrow \(A /(1+r)\) at interest rate \(r\) - Construct the following portfolio(对于卖方) - Sell the contract at price \(p\) - Lend \(A /(1+r)\) at interest rate \(r\)

为了实现双方的无套利,定价必须为\(P = A/(1+r)\)
